com.mesosphere.sdk.testing

Class SendOffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.testing.SendOffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Send, SimulationTick

    public class SendOffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Send
    A Send for sending a Protos.Offer which matches a specified pod's requirements to a scheduler under test.

        Description copied from interface: Send

        Parameters:
        state - the cluster's current state, containing a history of e.g. recent offers and launched tasks
